hero_text: QA Engineer, 2 years of experience in testing, focused on automated testing with TS and Playwright.
about_paragraph1: I'm Eric Rodrigues Diniz, 24 years old, currently in the 6th semester of the Software Engineering course at PUC Minas (Lourdes Campus). This semester, I'm studying software measurement and experimentation, software economics, and configuration and evolution management.
about_paragraph2: I'm a professional passionate about Software Quality, Test Automation, and Full Stack Development. My expertise lies in building efficient and scalable solutions, ensuring clean, well-structured, and testable code.
about_paragraph3: I have strong experience in Backend (Node.js with Express and Spring Boot) and Frontend (Next.js and Nuxt.js), applying SOLID principles and Clean Code to build robust and maintainable systems. I also have 2 years of experience working as a QA (both automation and manual), using Playwright and TypeScript for frontend and API regression testing. I’ve also performed integration tests using Axios and TypeScript. I contributed to building a testing platform at MOVA SEP SA using Nuxt.js, Pinia, and Axios on the frontend, while the backend was developed in PHP with Hyperf.
